title: Requires certification notice to tenant when rent is paid by human resources administration
summary: Provides that whenever rent is paid by NYC human resources administration on behalf of a tenant on public assistance, the department of housing preservation shall send a certification of payment to such tenant.

       Introduced  by M. of A. WRIGHT, COLTON -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of A.

       AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the  city  of  New  York,  in
         relation  to  certification  of payment of rent by the human resources
         administration to the tenant

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Title 26 of the administrative code of the city of New York
    2  is amended by adding a new chapter 10 to read as follows:
    3                                  CHAPTER 10
    4                    CERTIFICATION OF CERTAIN RENT PAYMENT
    5    S  26-901  CERTIFICATION  OF PAYMENT. (A) WHENEVER RENT IS PAID BY THE
    6  HUMAN RESOURCES ADMINISTRATION TO A LANDLORD ON BEHALF OF A  TENANT  WHO
    7  IS RECEIVING PUBLIC ASSISTANCE, THE HUMAN RESOURCES ADMINISTRATION SHALL
    8  ISSUE  A  CERTIFICATION  OF  PAYMENT TO SUCH TENANT, UPON REQUEST BY THE
    9  TENANT FOR CERTIFICATION. THE CERTIFICATION OF PAYMENT SHALL SET FORTH:
   10    (1) THE DATE THE PAYMENT WAS MAILED;
   11    (2) THE NAME OF THE LANDLORD TO WHOM THE PAYMENT WAS MAILED;
   12    (3) THE ADDRESS TO WHICH PAYMENT WAS MAILED; AND
   13    (4) THE AMOUNT OF PAYMENT MAILED.
   14    (B) A REQUEST FOR CERTIFICATION OF PAYMENT MAY BE MADE BY  THE  TENANT
   15  IN  PERSON AT THE TENANT'S ASSIGNED HUMAN RESOURCE ADMINISTRATION OFFICE
   16  OR BY THE TENANT OR THE LANDLORD BY TELEPHONE. IF A REQUEST IS  MADE  IN
   17  PERSON,  THE  CERTIFICATION  OF  PAYMENT  SHALL BE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE
   18  TENANT AT THE TENANT'S ASSIGNED HUMAN RESOURCE ADMINISTRATION OFFICE NOT
   19  MORE THAN TWO DAYS AFTER THE REQUEST IS MADE. IF THE REQUEST IS MADE  BY
   20  TELEPHONE,  THE  CERTIFICATION  OF PAYMENT SHALL BE SENT VIA FIRST CLASS
   21  MAIL TO THE TENANT AT HIS OR  HER  LAST  KNOWN  ADDRESS  NOT  MORE  THAN
   22  FIFTEEN  DAYS  AFTER  THE  REQUEST IS MADE. EACH HUMAN RESOURCE ADMINIS-

    2  LANDLORDS TO REQUEST CERTIFICATION OF PAYMENT.
    3    (C)  AT  THE TIME OF APPROVAL OF AN APPLICATION FOR PUBLIC ASSISTANCE,
    4  THE HUMAN RESOURCE ADMINISTRATION OFFICE SHALL PROVIDE THE APPLICANT FOR
    5  ASSISTANCE WITH WRITTEN NOTICE OF  HIS  OR  HER  RIGHT  TO  REQUEST  AND
    6  RECEIVE CERTIFICATION OF RENT PAYMENTS AS PROVIDED IN THIS SECTION.
    7    S 2. This act shall take effect on the one hundred twentieth day after
    8  it  shall have become a law; provided, however, that the human resources
    9  administration shall  promulgate  rules  and  regulations  necessary  to
   10  effectuate this act prior to such effective date.
